IJSonObj

Defines an interface to our basic JSON object returned by the parser.

Module

import Parsers.JSon.IJsonParser

Functions
AddElement
virtual void AddElement(
IJSonObj* pValue
) = 0

Adds a child element to this element (assumes it is either a map or array object)

Parameters
pValue
IJSonObj*

value to add

Returns the name of the object

virtual CJSonType GetType() = 0

Returns type of the JSON object
